title: Rngar 2 Champ Design
body:
Passive: Rngar can leap from 200 to 600 units when in a bush.
Q: Rngar deals a random amount of damage from 40% to 300% AD damage on his next basic atk.
W: Rngar has a 50% chance of healing for 500/550/600/650/700 hp.
E: Rngar throws his bola in a random direction.
R: Rngar stealths from 4 to 10 seconds.
